column1: Smoque BBQ////If you are going to get a side though
column2: GET THE COLESLAW. I was shocked at how amazing it was. I don't typically expect coleslaw to be the star of a meal
column3: but this came close. It's delicious and packed with sweet flavor without having that excess of mayonnaise that most slaws have. Another winner was the fries - hand cut
column5: and greasy in the best way. I was also a big fan of the peach cobbler. It uses canned peaches
column7: but still very delicious. The crust is super crumbly
column9: and sugary. I really enjoyed it.
